DOC.brief_summary: Through online survey , participant show different visual presentation vaccination data related school child care center . Participants rate important information think child 's health school choice . Participants also ask survey question knowledge Colorado state vaccination legislation , opinion practice relate childhood vaccination , view Zika virus vaccine .
DOC.brief_title: Parental Views Related Colorado State Legislation About Vaccinations , Schools , Child Care Centers
DOC.criteria: mother child 12 year age young English literacy complete survey respondent child appropriate age child attend school child care center outside home
